Blog.post: urlLink My CD's Cover. ( It Rocks )

Hi guys, Its been a Wile I Know But I've been at my dads for the weekend and it was fun. I bought some awesome CD's like... " The Best of Lead Zepplin " and, " experience Hendrix " They are some awesome CD's. And I got " THE SCHOOL OF ROCK " yay... Rock. Any way I'll post later I'm getting tired and I need to practice for my lesson tomorrow. So... Bye.

Hi, well yesterday I didn't post because I was really busy sleeping in and all. Anyway,yesterday we got off because it was SIX FLAG'S DAY at our school, so after I woke up (witch was around 2:00 PM)I just watched T.V. until my guitar lesson, witch was at 5:30. Yeah I did do chores but not much, my parents were OK that day. Today was a funny day at school. And when I say funny I mean entertaining. First in First hour (PE) I saw the village idiot, witch is a very short chubby person who is rude and stupid, get stuffed into a locker when he talked trash to a guy 3 times his size. It was funny because he was too big to fit in it but he's fat mashed around and allowed him to fit but he couldn't get out. Well that pretty much sums up the last 2 days. I need to go to "Teens", a church program that me and my friends go to. Latter
urlLink This is a very nice guitar!
urlLink Here is the movie I watched today

Any way, today was a preaty normal day;eat, sleep, chores, T.V., exept I watched school of rock and it made me whant to play my guitar. It is a realy cool movie and I really liked it. It got me into the "Guitarist" mood, and ive been playing my guitar scence 8:00 practicing for my lesson tomarow. On a nother side of things I got my picures working now so i can post those now too. later

Hi every one, this is my site on guitars and I hope u like it. I will be adding stuff to it to make it better so if it looks plain don't worry it will get better. P.S. electric guitars rock.
